org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.shortcircuit

Class DfsClientShmManager.EndpointShmManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.shortcircuit.DfsClientShmManager.EndpointShmManager
  • Enclosing class:
    DfsClientShmManager

     class DfsClientShmManager.EndpointShmManager
extends Object
    Manages short-circuit memory segments that pertain to a given DataNode.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DatanodeInfo datanode
      The datanode we're managing.
      private boolean disabled
      True if this datanode doesn't support short-circuit shared memory segments.
      private TreeMap<ShortCircuitShm.ShmId,DfsClientShm> full
      Shared memory segments which have no empty slots.
      private boolean loading
      True if we're in the process of loading a shared memory segment from this DataNode.
      private TreeMap<ShortCircuitShm.ShmId,DfsClientShm> notFull
      Shared memory segments which have at least one empty slot.

    • Field Detail

      • datanode

        private final DatanodeInfo datanode
        The datanode we're managing.

      • full

        private final TreeMap<ShortCircuitShm.ShmId,DfsClientShm> full
        Shared memory segments which have no empty slots. Protected by the manager lock.

      • notFull

        private final TreeMap<ShortCircuitShm.ShmId,DfsClientShm> notFull
        Shared memory segments which have at least one empty slot. Protected by the manager lock.

      • disabled

        private boolean disabled
        True if this datanode doesn't support short-circuit shared memory segments. Protected by the manager lock.

      • loading

        private boolean loading
        True if we're in the process of loading a shared memory segment from this DataNode. Protected by the manager lock.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DfsClientShmManager.EndpointShmManager

        DfsClientShmManager.EndpointShmManager(DatanodeInfo datanode)

    • Method Detail

      • allocSlotFromExistingShm

        private ShortCircuitShm.Slot allocSlotFromExistingShm(ExtendedBlockId blockId)
        Pull a slot out of a preexisting shared memory segment. Must be called with the manager lock held.
        Parameters:
        blockId - The blockId to put inside the Slot object.
        Returns:
        null if none of our shared memory segments contain a free slot; the slot object otherwise.

      • requestNewShm

        private DfsClientShm requestNewShm(String clientName,
                         DomainPeer peer)
                            throws IOException
        Ask the DataNode for a new shared memory segment. This function must be called with the manager lock held. We will release the lock while communicating with the DataNode.
        Parameters:
        clientName - The current client name.
        peer - The peer to use to talk to the DataNode.
        Returns:
        Null if the DataNode does not support shared memory segments, or experienced an error creating the shm. The shared memory segment itself on success.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there was an error communicating over the socket. We will not throw an IOException unless the socket itself (or the network) is the problem.

      • allocSlot

        ShortCircuitShm.Slot allocSlot(DomainPeer peer,
                             org.apache.commons.lang.mutable.MutableBoolean usedPeer,
                             String clientName,
                             ExtendedBlockId blockId)
                         throws IOException
        Allocate a new shared memory slot connected to this datanode. Must be called with the EndpointShmManager lock held.
        Parameters:
        peer - The peer to use to talk to the DataNode.
        clientName - The client name.
        usedPeer - (out param) Will be set to true if we used the peer. When a peer is used
        Returns:
        null if the DataNode does not support shared memory segments, or experienced an error creating the shm. The shared memory segment itself on success.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there was an error communicating over the socket.

      • freeSlot

        void freeSlot(ShortCircuitShm.Slot slot)
        Stop tracking a slot. Must be called with the EndpointShmManager lock held.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to release.

      • unregisterShm

        void unregisterShm(ShortCircuitShm.ShmId shmId)
        Unregister a shared memory segment. Once a segment is unregistered, we will not allocate any more slots inside that segment. The DomainSocketWatcher calls this while holding the DomainSocketWatcher lock.
        Parameters:
        shmId - The ID of the shared memory segment to unregister.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

        DfsClientShmManager.PerDatanodeVisitorInfo getVisitorInfo()

        final void shutdown(DfsClientShm shm)
